name: 'Hocus Pocus' 10.08.2019
description:
This piece which garnered much attention on Instagram (305 likes) is enough to make anyone feel dizzy.

Unique isometric designs as such aren't discovered every day, in fact - they are rare.

They are found in moments of inspiration and insight, when one sits down and contemplates about topics as deep as string theory.

'Hocus Pocus' is a majestic and magical artistic piece. It can inspire for generations and reminds the audience that our universe is capable of producing the unexpected time and time again.

What is around the corner? We cannot predict, but let's be excited about the future and not live in fear.

Perhaps the magic of the universe will work in our favour?

Artist: Tiago Hands [4,560 Youtube subscribers, 38,700 organic followers on Instagram (mathematics.proofs)]
